about_the_game:
Princess Lucrezia is admired the kingdom over for her strength and beauty, but all is not well in Hartverne Castle. The lackadaisical and widely reviled General Abol regularly shirks his duties, prompting the princess knight to train the troops in his stead. However, it isn't long before rumors begin to circulate about the pair, as Lucrezia constantly makes excuses for Abol and refuses to give him the boot. In the midst of this turbulent state of affairs, one lone soldier takes it upon himself to uncover the truth, but with monsters threatening the kingdom and the question of divine meddling on everyone's lips, who will be left standing when the dust settles?

The Soldier and the Golden Princess is a story driven adventure RPG.

As a proud soldier of Hartverne, your sleuthing skills will be put to the test as you investigate the secret relationship between Princess Lucrezia and General Abol. Though you may be brothers-in-arms, the castle watch won't hesitate to tear into you if they catch you snooping around. But don't worry, you aren't alone in your quest to satisfy your curiosity. The shady shopkeeper Lloyd is more than happy to supply you with all the tools you need to see your investigation through. Of course, none of this is an excuse to neglect your duties as a soldier! During the day, you'll have to embark on defense missions to safeguard the kingdom from the monsters that threaten it.

Will you rise to the occasion, or will your name be lost to history, like the many other nameless soldiers before you?

Protect Your Kingdom

Embark on thrilling missions by day, cutting down vicious monsters and honing your skills. Put on an impressive enough display, and who knows? You may just earn a reward from Princess Lucrezia.

Seek the Truth

Sneak through the castle's halls by night, evading detection as you endeavor to get to the bottom of Lucrezia and Abol's relationship. Seek and you shall find, but will what you find restore harmony or invite further chaos?

Story Driven Game

With minimal combat, there's little to get in the way of the story. During the day, select missions that the hero will embark on to help protect the kingdom. While at night, you must sneak around, avoiding detection as you try to uncover the corruption surrounding the princess.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 11/10/8
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.

short_description: Princess Knight Lucrezia is known for her exceptional swordsmanship and striking beauty, but when whispers about a secret relationship with the much-maligned General Abol start sweeping through the ranks, it falls to you, a lone soldier, to uncover the truth!
